        Parameters:

        descendant - The originator of this person.

      • addArrayOfPersons

        public void addArrayOfPersons(java.util.ArrayList<Person> personsArray)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Simply iterates over an array of persons and adds them all to the database.
        Parameters:
        personsArray - an array of person objects.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - in case there's an error with adding to the database.
